b:include.data: { sharingId: data:sharingId, originalUrl: data:post.url, platforms: data:this.sharing.platforms, shareUrl: data:post.shareUrl, shareTitle: data:post.title, }
b:include.name: sharingButtons

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting:
What are Telegram Groups?

Telegram groups are used to communicate with many people at a time. in the telegram differ from the other Social media application is the number of members in the groups. because there are unlimited people who can join the groups. these telegram groups are helping to connect with others members who also can interact with the session. basically its works as a dissuasion platform. members can join the telegram groups using invite links and also admin can also add the members to the groups. a special feature of the Telegram group is the using bots for managing groups it helps to protect members from scammers. So admin has more control system in telegram group. this is the overview of the telegram groups.

 

What is Telegram Channel?

Telegram channel is also similar to the telegram group but there is some differences base on their functionality. here users can join as subscribers so it is overall based on the admin view. admin can give the information to the subscribers. Telegram channels also have an invite links option and a direct add option. when members subscribe to the channel they can see all previous messages also

 

What is the type of Channel?

There is two types of channel are available.

     1.Private Channel

          in the private channel, there is no way to join the channel without an invite link or admin action.

     2. Public Channel

           the public group can be visible publicly. so all people can join the channels.
